attributes.name: footer-divider-inset
attributes.description: Sets the alignment of the left edge of the divider above the footer.

attributes.name: header-divider-inset
attributes.description: Sets the alignment of the left edge of the divider below the header.

attributes.name: title-heading-level
attributes.description: Informs assistive technologies what heading level the card title represents. Defaults to h2.

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Sets padding on all slots. Set `padding='none'` to remove padding solely from default slot. To override padding property, set component level token for desired slot.

attributes.name: show-footer-divider
attributes.description: Adds a divider above the footer to create a clearer definition between the body and footer.

attributes.name: show-header-divider
attributes.description: Adds a divider below the header to create a clearer definition between the header and body.

attributes.name: header-subtitle
attributes.description: Adds additional information about the card below the title.

attributes.name: header-title
attributes.description: Provides context for the content of the card.

properties.name: footerDividerInset
properties.description: Sets the alignment of the left edge of the divider above the footer.

properties.name: headerDividerInset
properties.description: Sets the alignment of the left edge of the divider below the header.

properties.name: titleHeadingLevel
properties.description: Informs assistive technologies what heading level the card title represents. Defaults to h2.

properties.name: padding
properties.description: Sets padding on all slots. Set `padding='none'` to remove padding solely from default slot. To override padding property, set component level token for desired slot.

properties.name: showFooterDivider
properties.description: Adds a divider above the footer to create a clearer definition between the body and footer.

properties.name: showHeaderDivider
properties.description: Adds a divider below the header to create a clearer definition between the header and body.

properties.name: headerSubtitle
properties.description: Adds additional information about the card below the title.

properties.name: headerTitle
properties.description: Provides context for the content of the card.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Use to insert card body content.

slots.name: jh-card-media
slots.description: Use to insert media content in the top section of the card. User may need to add addtional styling to elements such as border, object-fit, etc.

slots.name: jh-card-header
slots.description: Use to insert custom card header layout. Default layout includes `headerTitle` and `headerSubtitle` properties.

slots.name: jh-card-footer
slots.description: Use to insert card footer content.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-color-background
cssProperties.description: The card background-color. Defaults to `--jh-color-container-primary-enabled`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-border-radius
cssProperties.description: The card border-radius. Defaults to `--jh-border-radius-400`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-shadow
cssProperties.description: The card box-shadow. Defaults to `--jh-shadow-low`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-media-aspect-ratio
cssProperties.description: The media slot aspect-ratio. Defaults to `auto`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-media-space-padding
cssProperties.description: The media slot padding. Defaults to `0`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-header-color-text
cssProperties.description: The header text color. Defaults to `--jh-color-content-primary-enabled`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-header-space-padding
cssProperties.description:
The header slot padding. Defaults to `--jh-dimension-400 --jh-dimension-600 0`. When `padding="small"`, defaults to
`--jh-dimension-400 --jh-dimension-400 0`. When `padding="small"` and `show-header-divider`, defaults to `--jh-dimension-400`. When `padding="medium"` or
`padding="none'` and `show-header-divider`, defaults to `--jh-dimension-400 --jh-dimension-600`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-default-color-text
cssProperties.description: The default slot text color. Defaults to `--jh-color-content-primary-enabled`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-default-space-padding
cssProperties.description:
The default slot padding. Defaults to `--jh-dimension-400 --jh-dimension-600`. When `padding="small"`, defaults
to `--jh-dimension-400`. When `padding="none"`, defaults to `--jh-dimension-400 0`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-footer-color-text
cssProperties.description: The footer slot text color. Defaults to `--jh-color-content-secondary-enabled`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-footer-space-padding
cssProperties.description:
The footer slot padding. Defaults to `0 --jh-dimension-600 --jh-dimension-400`. When `padding="small"`, defaults to
`0 --jh-dimension-400 --jh-dimension-400`. When `padding="small"` and `show-footer-divider`, defaults to `--jh-dimension-400`. When `padding="medium"` or
`padding="none"` and `show-footer-divider`, defaults to `--jh-dimension-400 --jh-dimension-600`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-header-title-color-text
cssProperties.description: The header title text color. Defaults to `--jh-color-content-primary-enabled`.

cssProperties.name: --jh-card-header-subtitle-color-text
cssProperties.description: The header subtitle text color. Defaults to `--jh-color-content-secondary-enabled`.

attributes.name: accessible-label
attributes.description: Sets an `aria-label` to assist screen reader users when no visible label is present.

attributes.name: error-text
attributes.description: Text to be displayed when checkbox group has failed validation and `invalid` is true.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: Provides additional context or guidance for using the checkbox group. For `helper-text` to be displayed, the `label` property must also be set.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: Sets an `aria-invalid` on the checkbox group to indicate the value supplied was invalid and displays `error-text` when set.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Describes the type of data to be collected.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Indicates a value is required.

attributes.name: orientation
attributes.description: Determines the orientation of the checkbox group.

attributes.name: accessible-label
attributes.description: Sets an `aria-label` on the input field to assist screen reader users when no visible label is present.

attributes.name: accessible-label-clear-button
attributes.description: Sets an aria-label on the clear button to assist screen reader users. Indicates that activating the button will clear the input field.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description:
Determines whether the browser can provide assistance in filling out the input value and what type of information is expected.
This property will override any autocomplete attribute present on the input's parent form element.

[Visit MDN for information on supported autocomplete values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the input and prevents all user interactions. May cause the input to be ignored by assistive technologies (AT).

attributes.name: enterkeyhint
attributes.description:
Specifies which action label or icon to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

[Visit MDN for information on supported enterkeyhint values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/enterkeyhint)

attributes.name: error-text
attributes.description: Text to be displayed when input has failed validation and `invalid` is true.

attributes.name: helper-text
attributes.description: Provides additional context or guidance for using the input. For `helper-text` to be displayed, the `label` property must also be set.

attributes.name: hide-left-slot
attributes.description: Hides the left slot from input.

attributes.name: hide-right-slot
attributes.description: Hides the right slot from input.

attributes.name: input-mask
attributes.description: Formats the user entered data on input. Does not apply to pasted values. See input mask documentation above for implementation details.

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.description:
Indicates expected input value type and allows for browsers to display appropriate virtual keyboard.

[Visit MDN for information on supported inputmode values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/inputmode)

events.name: jh-select
events.description: Dispatched when text is selected. Event payload contains the selected text, the starting index of the selection, and the ending index of the selection. These values can be accessed via `e.detail.selected`, `e.detail.selectionStart`, and `e.detail.selectionEnd`.

events.name: jh-change
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed and input loses focus. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-input
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-maxlength
events.description: Dispatched when the `maxlength` property is set and it's value is reached.

events.name: jh-input:clear-button-click
events.description: Dispatched when the clear button is activated. Event payload contains the previous value of the input field before it was cleared and can be accessed via `e.detail.previousValue`.

slots.name: jh-input-left
slots.description: Use to insert an element on the left side of the input field, such as an icon or button.

slots.name: jh-input-right
slots.description: Use to insert an element on the right side of the input field, such as an icon or button.

slots.name: jh-input-clear-button
slots.description: Use to insert an icon within the clear button.

properties.name: accessibleLabelHidePassword
properties.description: Sets an `aria-label` on the toggle password button, which encapsulates the `jh-input-password-visible` slot, to assist screen reader users. The label should indicate that activating the button will mask the password.

properties.name: accessibleLabelShowPassword
properties.description: Sets an `aria-label` on the toggle password button, which encapsulates the `jh-input-password-hidden` slot, to assist screen reader users. The label should indicate that activating the button will unmask the password.

properties.name: passwordVisible
properties.description: Unmasks the input field value when set.

properties.name: accessibleLabel
properties.description: Sets an `aria-label` on the input field to assist screen reader users when no visible label is present.

properties.name: accessibleLabelClearButton
properties.description: Sets an aria-label on the clear button to assist screen reader users. Indicates that activating the button will clear the input field.

properties.name: autocomplete
properties.description:
Determines whether the browser can provide assistance in filling out the input value and what type of information is expected.

events.name: jh-select
events.description: Dispatched when text is selected. Event payload contains the selected text, the starting index of the selection, and the ending index of the selection. These values can be accessed via `e.detail.selected`, `e.detail.selectionStart`, and `e.detail.selectionEnd`.

events.name: jh-change
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed and input loses focus. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-input
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-maxlength
events.description: Dispatched when the `maxlength` property is set and it's value is reached.

events.name: jh-input:clear-button-click
events.description: Dispatched when the clear button is activated. Event payload contains the previous value of the input field before it was cleared and can be accessed via `e.detail.previousValue`.

slots.name: jh-input-password-hidden
slots.description: Use to insert a custom icon within the toggle password button when the input value is masked.

slots.name: jh-input-password-visible
slots.description: Use to insert a custom icon within the toggle password button when the input value is unmasked.

slots.name: jh-input-left
slots.description: Use to insert an element on the left side of the input field, such as an icon or button.

slots.name: jh-input-right
slots.description: Use to insert an element on the right side of the input field, such as an icon or button.

slots.name: jh-input-clear-button
slots.description: Use to insert an icon within the clear button.

properties.description: Sets an aria-label on the clear button to assist screen reader users. Indicates that activating the button will clear the input field.

properties.name: autocomplete
properties.description:
Determines whether the browser can provide assistance in filling out the input value and what type of information is expected.
This property will override any autocomplete attribute present on the input's parent form element.

[Visit MDN for information on supported autocomplete values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete)

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disables the input and prevents all user interactions. May cause the input to be ignored by assistive technologies (AT).

properties.name: enterkeyhint
properties.description:
Specifies which action label or icon to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

[Visit MDN for information on supported enterkeyhint values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/enterkeyhint)

properties.name: errorText
properties.description: Text to be displayed when input has failed validation and `invalid` is true.

properties.name: helperText
properties.description: Provides additional context or guidance for using the input. For `helper-text` to be displayed, the `label` property must also be set.

properties.name: hideLeftSlot
properties.description: Hides the left slot from input.

properties.name: hideRightSlot
properties.description: Hides the right slot from input.

properties.name: inputMask
properties.description: Formats the user entered data on input. Does not apply to pasted values. See input mask documentation above for implementation details.

properties.name: inputmode
properties.description:
Indicates expected input value type and allows for browsers to display appropriate virtual keyboard.

[Visit MDN for information on supported inputmode values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/inputmode)

properties.name: invalid
properties.description: Sets an `aria-invalid` attribute on input to indicate the value supplied was invalid. Also displays `error-text` and error state styling when set.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Identifies what data should be entered into the input field.

properties.name: maxlength
properties.description: Sets the maximum number of characters a user can enter into the field.

properties.name: minlength
properties.description: Sets the minimum number of characters a user can enter into the field.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Sets a name for the input control.

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: Prevents users from changing the input value. Removes all slotted content.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Indicates a value is required.

properties.name: showCharCount
properties.description: Displays a character counter at the bottom right corner below the input field.

properties.name: showClearButton
properties.description: Displays a clear button in the input field when it contains a value and is focused or hovered. Deletes input value when activated.

properties.name: showIndicator
properties.description: Adds a visual indicator next to the label. Indicates that a value is optional(by default) or required if the `required` property is also set.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Sets the size of the input.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Sets the value of the input.

events.name: jh-select
events.description: Dispatched when text is selected. Event payload contains the selected text, the starting index of the selection, and the ending index of the selection. These values can be accessed via `e.detail.selected`, `e.detail.selectionStart`, and `e.detail.selectionEnd`.

events.name: jh-change
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed and input loses focus. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-input
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-maxlength
events.description: Dispatched when the `maxlength` property is set and it's value is reached.

events.name: jh-input:clear-button-click
events.description: Dispatched when the clear button is activated. Event payload contains the previous value of the input field before it was cleared and can be accessed via `e.detail.previousValue`.

slots.name: jh-input-left
slots.description: Use to insert an element on the left side of the input field, such as an icon or button.

slots.name: jh-input-right
slots.description: Use to insert an element on the right side of the input field, such as an icon or button.

slots.name: jh-input-clear-button
slots.description: Use to insert an icon within the clear button.

properties.name: readonly

properties.name: required
properties.description: Indicates a value is required.

properties.name: showCharCount
properties.description: Displays a character counter at the bottom right corner below the input field.

properties.name: showClearButton
properties.description: Displays a clear button in the input field when it contains a value and is focused or hovered. Deletes input value when activated.

properties.name: showIndicator
properties.description: Adds a visual indicator next to the label. Indicates that a value is optional(by default) or required if the `required` property is also set.

properties.name: size

events.name: jh-select
events.description: Dispatched when text is selected. Event payload contains the selected text, the starting index of the selection, and the ending index of the selection. These values can be accessed via `e.detail.selected`, `e.detail.selectionStart`, and `e.detail.selectionEnd`.

events.name: jh-change
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed and input loses focus. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-input
events.description: Dispatched when the value of the input has changed. Event payload includes the value of the input and can be accessed via `e.detail.value`. Payload also includes the raw/unformatted value when an input mask is applied and can be accessed via `e.detail.rawValue`.

events.name: jh-maxlength
events.description: Dispatched when the `maxlength` property is set and it's value is reached.

events.name: jh-input:clear-button-click
events.description: Dispatched when the clear button is activated. Event payload contains the previous value of the input field before it was cleared and can be accessed via `e.detail.previousValue`.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description:
Determines whether the browser can provide assistance in filling out the input value and what type of information is expected.
This property will override any autocomplete attribute present on the input's parent form element.

[Visit MDN for information on supported autocomplete values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the input and prevents all user interactions. May cause the input to be ignored by assistive technologies (AT).

attributes.name: enterkeyhint
attributes.description:
Specifies which action label or icon to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

[Visit MDN for information on supported enterkeyhint values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/enterkeyhint)

attributes.name: helper-text

attributes.description: Formats the user entered data on input. Does not apply to pasted values. See input mask documentation above for implementation details.

attributes.name: inputmode

[Visit MDN for information on supported inputmode values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/inputmode)

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: Sets the indeterminate state on progress. To be used when progress cannot be calculated.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Provides information about the item which triggered the progress component.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sets the size of the progress component.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Determines the style of progress to display.

attributes.name: hide-value
attributes.description: Hides the `value` text.

attributes.name: accessible-label
attributes.description: Sets an `aria-label` to assist screen reader users when no visible label is present.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Defines the maximum allowed value and sets `aria-valuemax` attribute.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Defines the minimum allowed value and sets `aria-valuemin` attribute.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Specifies how much of the task has been completed. This value is used to calculate the percentage complete based on the min and max values.

attributes.name: accessible-valuetext
attributes.description: Sets `aria-valuetext` on progress indicator to provide text alternative of `aria-valuenow`. To be used when progress cannot be represented as a number.
